name: Pocket Lover! (1/4 demo)
description:
Hey this is my first game :b, I've always loved romance horror games so I played around with renpy a little to make this.  If I continue this I'll make the story more understandable and stuff, but for now I just wanted to mess around with coding :)

Real relationships are hard, why not switch to a fake one?  Your virtual boyfriend Nial  is cute,  sweet, and the perfect distraction that keeps you occupied for hours. But as more of your time gets taken up by the real world, and real people, Nial gets a little jealous...            

I own none of the music, so here's the links! (all of these were free to use): 

Opening theme , music for when Nial's on screen , Meet Liam , Nial gets mad (only in one of the branching paths , and all sounds are from bensound 

TW this game will include the following (in the full release: Body horror, murder,  gore, dismemberment, slight trypophobia, and very bad grammar and spelling
